column5: With the old board a user was able to delete his or her own post with a clik of a button. Is that feature availabe here? I wanted to delete my "bored@workchatanyone"  post, wasnt able to find a way to delete the thread
sturgman, i had the same question, i tried deleting one of my posts but couldnt find the button? lol
PM any mod and we will delete it for you.We had trouble with some stirring the pot then deleting the post.
Rick... You'll have to help with this one... ive got all the edit buttons.. but Im sure reg users dont see 'em...

Mods, is it possible to add a "delete thread" button to the common users like me? It would have come in handy yesterday when i created the red fridays survey.After it was oficially posted i was unhappy that the pic I thought was putting up wasnt there. At that time I would have liked to pull it and try again, but wasnt able too. Not being whinny here, just a suggestion.  You guys have done a faboulous job with the new site!!
You an always edit your post, sturg, but I have no way to differentiate common users from uncommon.. Rather than pull it and try again, just go back and fix it.
thanks Rick,  Its not always easy @ 2 a.m after a few wobblys!!
